name: Windows MessageBox
author: corelanc0d3r <peter.ve@corelan.be>
jduck <jduck@metasploit.com>
description: Spawns a dialog via MessageBox using a customizable title, text & icon

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: PrependMigrate
options.description: Spawns and runs shellcode in new process

options.name: PrependMigrateProc
options.description: Process to spawn and run shellcode in

options.name: EXITFUNC
options.description: Exit technique (Accepted: '', seh, thread, process, none)

options.name: TITLE
options.description: Messagebox Title (max 255 chars) Max parameter length: 255 characters

options.name: TEXT
options.description: Messagebox Text (max 255 chars) Max parameter length: 255 characters

options.name: ICON
options.description: Icon type can be NO, ERROR, INFORMATION, WARNING or QUESTION
